PSCT.Vegas:
2 Level 4 monsters
① You can detach 2 Materials from this card, then target 1 opponent's Special Summoned Attack Position monster; attach it to this card as material 
(You can only use this effect of "Number 101: Silent Honor ARK" once per turn). 
② If this card would be destroyed, you can detach 1 material from it, instead.
